title: card.led Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Used along with the card.aux API to turn connected LEDs on/off (not supported by Notecard LoRa), or to manage a single connected NeoPixel. If using monochromatic LEDs, they must be wired according to the instructions provided in the guide on Using Monitor Mode. If using NeoPixels, the NeoPixel (or strip of NeoPixels) must be wired according to the instructions provided in the guide on Using Neo-Monitor Mode.

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

mode.description: Used to specify the color of the LED to turn on or off. Possible values for LEDs are 'red', 'green', 'yellow'. For NeoPixels, possible values are 'red', 'green', 'blue', 'yellow', 'cyan', 'magenta', 'orange', 'white', 'gray'

on.description: Set to true to turn the specified LED or NeoPixel on

off.description: Set to true to turn the specified LED or NeoPixel off
